name: Administration Part
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="administration_part"
	label="Administration Part"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_administration_part"
	sql_title_column="name"
	sql_title_key="guid"
	urlSelect="index.php?option=com_###component###&view=administration_parts&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=administration_part.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=administration_part.edit&guid={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	titleSelect="Select Administration Part"
	titleNew="New Administration Part"
	titleEdit="Edit Administration Part"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="true"
	edit="true"
	clear="true"
	class="input-large"
	description="The administration body part"
	hint="Select a Administration Part"
/>
